body: What happen if user ask to do FP32/FP16 for a graph with these ops? I know this sounds stupid and normal people shouldn't ask for that, but to make the logic correct, I think the converter should skip handling them instead of removing them. Maybe we can add a precision_mode parameter in this `IsTensorRTCandidate()` function for that.
